data.actual_result: Message says you are blocked or don't share a server with the recipient
data.expected_result: Message says something to the effect of 'wait until tableflip cooldown'
data.short_description: Clyde gives the wrong message when DM'ing someone after joining a tableflip server
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a server with tableflip enabled - DM someone whose only mutual server is the one you just joined - Get the error message from Clyde
